title: Episode 315: Graduated Cum Laude (Feat. Sierra Gates & Eric Whitehead)
itunes:title: Episode 315: Graduated Cum Laude (Feat. Sierra Gates & Eric Whitehead)
description:
Love and Hip Hop Atlanta's BOSS couple Sierra Gates & Eric Whitehead joined the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote their flourishing businesses - Sierra with The Glam Shop and Eric with PTG 365. Sierra and Eric were so great and honest, especially when discussing the baggage that comes with each partner when entering a relationship. The couple discussed their desire to have kids, the fact this relationship was a condom-free relationship, and Sierra even admitted to her lack of experience performing fellatio, and having Eric teach her the way! Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
